::KitKat::

She looked at Destructor. "No, I need to finish this."  she then 
yawned,"Or, maybe your right. I could use some rest. But this has to 
be done. I have to finish this first." She looked at Drillbit and 
smiled again at him. She took the piece of paper with her room on it, 
and then up at Destructor. She stood up and stretched. "You sure, I 
can stay and complete this.  We need to know all we can about this 
spark. if we can figure out how he cloned hismelf we might find...." 
she stopped as a horrible thought crossed her mind. She sat back down 
with a fearfull look on her face. She muttered," By the matrix,no. Oh 
no." she stared at the floor. She thought how this might be the start 
of a clone war. She didn't move.  Her mind went into different 
direction.  She wondered if Megatron could clone two to three bots, 
what's stopping him from cloning an army. He could over run the 
planet with clones. Her breathing rate increased as she continued to 
think on this. That If all the groups were to start cloning, no one 
would know the real from the clone. No one would be safe. You kill 
one bot and four thousand clones would follow. 

She shook her head to clear her thoughts, but the threat of the 
clones consumed her mind.  She wondered if Megatron found a way to 
perfect the cloning, he could create dozens of armies, armies of 
Megatrons. She felt the color drain from her face, but still stared 
at the floor. She muttered,"By the matrix, we can not.....allow 
this.  He....He must be stopped."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  He saw how tired she was and felt a little concerned.."I'll finish 
up here, 
> I want you to get some sleep. You are no help to us tired. And I 
want you 
> full alert when we plan our next move against Megatron..please do 
not refuse. 
> Let me help." He wrote down the postion of her quarters on a piece 
of 
> paper..."Now go and sleep." he handed her the paper.
